Html:

mmx2014
What do you want to do?

Hello,

I just want to display any website via URL address on Gmap.
For example, there is a contorl in C# , Webbrowser and you can do it :
        webBrowser1.Url = new Uri ("http://www.google.de");
        webBrowser1.Refresh();
I miss these commands in Gmap.

I
That's because GMapControl is not a webbrowser...
It's pity, anyway thank you for your help.
